titles.title: A bill to amend the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to pay at least as much to use privately owned farms for grain storage as is paid to commercial storage facilities for such purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 6/3/1987--Introduced. Amends the Commodity Credit Corporation Charter Act to direct the Commodity Credit Corporation to pay on-farm grain storage rates at not less than commercial rates.
